name: Offroad Car Simulator
description:
Offroad Car Simulator 3D

Feel real offroad driving, try various cars, enjoy completing levels!!!

Game is created to bring realistic offroad car 3D experience on mobile devices. Simulator comes with 9 different cars, true physics, professional car control system!

You will drive car in mountain rocky environments, in the winter on the snow, races on ground and asphalt roads and safari - desert car simulator. Also enjoy real car jumping experiences in jump levels and show high level driving skills.

Game includes 3 type of controls: gyroscope, steering wheel, buttons.
